author: wn.com
title: International Year of Soils 2015 celebrated with exhibition at KU Museum (2-13 September 2015) (Kyoto ...
text: ( Source : Kyoto University ) From 2 through 13 September , the Kyoto University Museum hosted a traveling exhibition, 'Soils: What Are They?', designed by the Saitama Museum of Rivers to mark the United Nations International Year of Soils
